translations: 惹怒，使恼火；用荨麻刺伤或鞭打（某人）

sentences.sentence: Nettle was thus able to see just how picky women are, given the chance.
sentences.translation: 这样一来，内特尔就可以看出女人是多么挑剔。

sentences.sentence: Nettle were thus able to see just how picky women are, given the chance.
sentences.translation: 这样一来，内特尔就可以看出女人是多么挑剔。

sentences.sentence: They are all heroes grasping the nettle.
sentences.translation: 他们都是迎着艰险上的英雄。
